titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain polyethylene base materials.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/10/1998--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2000, the duty on polyethylene base materials that are under 250mm in width, sanded on one side and surface-treated for use in the manufacture of skis.
